attributes.title: Ewwww
attributes.review: I downloaded just to stay informed and it has given me nothing but false news and harassing me every single day to “donate” when we are in the middle of a pandemic and to top it off I’m now getting emails from their campaign team calling me a little broke rat since I can’t donate. They just bully people into giving them money it’s a scam.

attributes.title: Wrost app EVER
attributes.review: When you open the app the first thing you see is an orange, umm sorry I mean your president.  Don’t recommend. Not to mention the man is a racist hypocrite he is also extremely disrespectful. Trying to take down Tik tok. Literally learned more from that app then I did from school. Who else is here from the Tik tok of that one guy. Ye same. K well got nothing else to write. Byeeee

attributes.title: Really disgusting
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of gaining some insight to my favorite reality show, “The Apprentice” but was I wrong. Nothing but information sucking and tracking. They kept asking for so much of my personal data that i just have to leave a review. I’m not the type of person to ever leave reviews like this but this app is horrifying!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD. 😾

attributes.title: Peepeepoopoo
attributes.review: When I opens up the app it asked for my address information to send me a free gift, I gladly put in my info but in the middle of the night burglars came into my home and burgled all of my furniture and appliances!! ÙmÚ. Very rude indeed. When I looked around all that was left was a single Cheeto lying on the floor where my table used to be. Quite devastating really.

attributes.title: This app is cancelled!!!
attributes.review: Why is this even app it’s a disgraceful to all apps. Anyways I’m bored of of this so called president in my very humble opinion we should get Obama back. So how is your day going so far? Good or bad? Mine is going horrible bc of this app I just don’t understand y it’s here like u did this for what? Anyways I’m out of here remember to say the reviews are helpful!!!

attributes.title: Disappointed 💔
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch horribly😤Since I have the iPhone 5 a lot of my apps glitch but this one was by far the worst❤️. It kept logging me off the app & my other apps don’t do that 👁👄👁 I downloaded this app to be educated about our homophobic, racist, transphobic president🙈 but that wasn’t possible. Maybe next time🌈🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.title: Pathetic
attributes.review: I wish I could give this app a zero star rating. Sadly, it has the lowest being one star without my consent. This app is truly disgusting. I do not wish to see an oompa loompa on my phone screen at all. Deleting immediately. Horrific, horrid, and disturbing are a few of the terms I’d use to describe such a disgusting app established by such incompetence of a “president”.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review:
this app was DISGUSTING!!! i opened it just to find the most HIDEOUS orange chicken i have EVER seen!!!! THE SO CALLED “MAN” THAT WAS THE FIRST THING I SAW LOOKED LIKE HE WAS ON LIFE SUPPORT!!!! my eyes are disgusted and are vomiting 🤮!!! my mother has to write this review for me because i can’t even see ❌👄❌
I WAS BEGGING MY MOTHER TO NOT LOOK AT THE APP AND THANKFULLY I SAVED HER AYES AND HER LIFE!!! I THINK APPLE SHOULD TAKE DOWN THIS APP BECUASE IT IS DISTURBING!!! 17 YEAR OLD SHOULD NOT BE ALOUD TO DOWNLOAD THIS!!! NO ONE SHOULD!!! I SAW A PICTURE OF A REALLY HANDSOME YOYNG BOY THO AMD HE NEEDS TO BE SAVED FROM THAT DISGUSTING MAN THAT I SAW 🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: absolute rubbish
attributes.review: Got this app to see what was going on with Trumpy. It was an immaculate disappointment. When I first opened it had an extremely disturbing picture of DONAL that I am to decent to even begin to describe. Then told me if I don’t buy a MAGA hat and wear it everywhere along with not wearing a mask, I would be cancelled. That is extremely unpresidential behavior and the Trumpet has LOST my vote.

attributes.title: Disgusting & vile
attributes.review: I opened this app and was horrified to see this man was planing on running for president again yet he has done nothing but bring mass disruption to our country. My dog whined and growled as soon as I opened this horrid app, it was a very sad site to whiteness. I can not express the amount of absolute disgust I’ve felt while looking through here smh. My dog deserves justice for this 😭
